<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This fix script helps to force a re-pull of content data for all the SAMS tables</description> <name>Force re-pull of SAMS content tables</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[function forceCDSrepull() { var tables = ['samp_content_version', 'samp_sw_publisher', 'samp_sw_product']; var clientSchedule = new GlideMultipleUpdate('cds_client_schedule'); clientSchedule.addQuery('table.table', 'IN', tables); clientSchedule.setValue('last_updated_on', ''); clientSchedule.execute(); gs.info('Paris: Software Asset Management Foundation - Set cds_client_schedule.last_updated_on to empty is complete.'); }
forceCDSrepull();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-08-17 21:16:32</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2a2732a873002300d583534a7af6a731</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Force re-pull of SAMS content tables</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">bd1f72f347213110020ba9f8536d43db</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_2a2732a873002300d583534a7af6a731</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-04-26 01:27:06</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
